featured.text: Dr. Sax, a proponent of single-sex education, points out that keeping boys and girls separate in the classroom has yielded striking educational, social, and interpersonal benefits.

definition.zh_def: 人際的，涉及人與人之間的互動或關係。
definition.en_def: Relating to relationships or communication between people.
definition.example: Good interpersonal skills are essential for effective teamwork.
